name: DataTransfer.files
description: The DataTransfer.files property is a list of the files in the drag operation. If the operation includes no files, the list is empty.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'files' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.name: HTML 5.1
refs.description: The definition of 'files' in the 'HTML 5.1' specification.
